channel.title: WELCOME TO MY PORTFOLIO on ABDELLAHI
channel.description: Recent content in WELCOME TO MY PORTFOLIO on ABDELLAHI

item.title: Project 1: Access to Public Health
item.description: A study to determine what are the main factors of public health access in Mauritania , in order to drive new polytics that can ensure a concrete improvment that the mejority of people need Link to GitHub Repository

item.title: Project : The determinants of anemia in the Mauritanian Population
item.description: In this project we used the mauritanain version of the famous DHS data, Me along with two colleagues could do an overall analysis to understand the data and prepare it for oul ML models that we used. Link to GitHub Repository

item.title: Project 2: ESP GRADES APP
item.description: A web app that displays the grades of students in the department of Data Science in ESP. Link to GitHub Repository

item.title: Short bio
item.description: I am a passionate and results-driven data scientist with a strong background in Python, Pandas, NumPy, and Scikit-learn. Fluent in Arabic, English, and French, enabling effective communication and collaboration in diverse environments. I have acquired many certifications related to my majors and interests. My commitment to continuous learning is reflected in my current pursuit of a Data Science Engineering Diploma at École Supérieure Polytechnique de Nouakchott. My communication skills are highlighted by my ability to present findings clearly to non-technical stakeholders.
